title: joker1313
author: joker1313
content: As my title says im looking to hire a person who can run my campaigns. I have database of multiple users where i need to send my content.Anyone offering software service for that or any developer out there who can work on this with prior experience. Im looking for a long term relationship and i will go through every check box, so time wasters stay away from me. Anyone eligible can contact me through DM here and then we can discuss the remaining things.Thank you
